casebody.data:
COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 315PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2018 Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cooper, Roy A. (III). Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Berger, Philip E., et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Professor Marin K. Levy.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of November 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of November 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 10th day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
